title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: No children are listed when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 2. The new data source has no information about databases, tables or columns. Actual result: No children are listed when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. Closing the data set editor and reopening it does not resolve the issue.
EB: The children should be listed when changing the data source for a data set. Expected result: When changing the data source, the children of the new data source should be listed.
